Life studies of the Great Army / by Edwin Forbes ; a historical work of art in copper-plate etching, containing forty plates, illustrating the life of the Union Armies during the years 1862- '3- '4- '5.

Life studies of the Great Army / by Edwin Forbes ; a historical work of art in copper-plate etching, containing forty plates, illustrating the life of the Union Armies during the years 1862- '3- '4- '5.
40 leaves of plates; camp scenes, soldiers on the march, pickets, African Americans, battle scenes.
